summary: The diff implements the majority of requirements: REQ-8 (Heavenuse rebranding), REQ-9 (backend chat model and API), REQ-10 (GroupChatPage), REQ-11 (MediaGallery), and REQ-12 (member display names). Nearly all acceptance criteria appear to be addressed. Minor gaps exist around polling (refetchInterval) evidence in the diff and member-list display on the group page, but file summaries confirm polling hooks and MemberDisplayName component exist. Overall implementation is comprehensive.

hallucinated_features.description: A migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added to handle schema migration from old to new actor state.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement or AC requested a migration module or backward-compatibility migration layer. The build request only asked for backend data model and API additions in main.mo.

hallucinated_features.description: A getDisplayName query function and useGetDisplayName hook were added to the backend and frontend.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-12 requires showing display names but specifies resolving sender display name at send time stored in message. A separate getDisplayName RPC was not explicitly requested, though it serves the member list use case.
